scripts.build:all: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:happ && npm run build:bindings && npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:playground
scripts.devtest: npm run build:all && concurrently "npm run build:watch -w webcomponents" "npm run build:watch -w playground/webapp" "npm run start"
scripts.start:happ:mem: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | $npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate secret.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a hSecret network mem
scripts.start:happ:holo: RUST_LOG=trace WASM_LOG=trace echo "pass" | $npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate secret.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a hSecret network --bootstrap https://bootstrap.holo.host/ webrtc wss://signal.holo.host
scripts.start:happ:local: RUST_LOG=trace WASM_LOG=trace echo "pass" | $npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate secret.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a hSecret network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOT_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.start: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' concurrently "npm run watch:webcomponents" "npm run start:happ:holo" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui -w playground/webapp"
scripts.start:local: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' concurrently "npm run watch:webcomponents" "npm run start:happ:local" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui -w playground/webapp"
scripts.start:mem: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' concurrently "npm run watch:webcomponents" "npm run start:happ:mem" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui -w playground/webapp"
scripts.serve: cross-env BOOT_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run serve:run" "npm run start:happ:local"
scripts.network2: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:all && cross-env BOOT_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run serve:run" "npm run start:local" "sleep 1 && npm run start:local"
scripts.network3: npm run clean:hc & cross-env BOOT_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run serve:run" "npm run start:local" "npm run start:local" "npm run start:local"
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:hc && npm run clean && npm run clean:npm
